successes.title: TidyTilt for iPhone
successes.description: TidyTilt is an earbud cord wrap, kickstand, and mount for iPhone 4/4S, designed for the modern lifestyle.

Pledges.description: A personalized thank-you message from us, plus a mention on our website as an official supporter.
